participant_1.background:
My daily routine is to stay closeted and hide my true self from my family, but I dream of a day when I can finally be free to be myself.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
i am a hardcore biker.
I put on my red shoes and head out to the field to practice.
i have a dog that has behavioral issues.

participant_2.background:
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
i have a dog and two cats.
I watch old Thierry Henry videos to cheer myself up.
I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
I have started to make plans for my retirement, including where I want to live and what I want to do with my time.

content.text: I am doing well! I am just getting ready to cook dinner.
What are you making for dinner?
I am making a stir fry.
Oh that sounds yummy! I love stir fry.
Me too! I love watching my food come together and seeing how the flavors blend.
I can relate to that. I love to cook.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love pasta! Do you have any favorite pasta dishes?
I love making spaghetti with meatballs.
Oh that sounds delicious! I love meatballs!
Me too! I love to make them from scratch.
That's awesome! I always buy them pre-made.
You should try making them from scratch sometime. They're really easy and they taste so much better.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
